@benimator wrote:

I was working on my server and i came across a problem. The source i am using is a 317 server and it has construction, but you are able to build items anywhere. How can i make it so construction can be used in the construction area only? Will i need to add a public boolean? or can i add something here:

case 28172: if(c.playerLevel[21] >= 65) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sM("You Create: Altar Of Flames"); c.addSkillXP(7000, 21); c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY-1, 4090, 0, 10); c.specGFX(624); } if(c.playerLevel[21] < 65){ c.sM("You need a Construction level of 65 to build: Altar Of Flames"); } break;
